name: Miss Match Cubes
description:
In this game you play as two cubes, you control both of them simultaneously , your goal is to avoid obstacles by dodging or by using Swapping Power.

  • Red Cube can go through Red Blocks.
  • Blue Cube can go through Blue Blocks.

Controls:

  • Right=> D
  • Left=> A
  • Swap Color=> K

Note: If Swap doesn't work , resize game screen to smaller size like: 640 x 480
